summary: REGARDING A SAFETY RECALL - OCCUPANT RESTRAINT CONTROLLER  S61/NHTSA 16V-668.  WAS NOTIFIED OF THE RE-CALL LAST OCTOBER, 2016 AND HAVE CALLED THREE TIMES REGARDING THE OUTCOME.  NONE AS OF THIS DATE - JUNE 27, 2016.  IF IN FACT THIS A SERIOUS PROBLEM AND IT APPEARS SO REGARDING A POTENTIAL LOSS OF AIR BAG AND SEAT BELT PRETENSIONER DEPLOYMENT DURING A CRASH WHICH COULD CAUSE INCREASE IN INJURY, WHY IS THIS NOT BEING TAKEN CARE OF IN A REASONABLE TIME FRAME?  WAY TOO LONG IF IT INVOLVES CUSTOMER SAFETY?  THIS IS REALLY NOT ACCEPTABLE IN THE CUSTOMER'S SITUATION.
